subject: Speedskating
Olympic Games (2014)
lead_paragraph: The United States speedskaters were projected to win 10 medals, but through 8 of 16 events they haven’t won one, distracted by uniform concerns and dominated by skaters from the Netherlands.
snippet: The United States speedskaters were projected to win 10 medals, but through 8 of 16 events they haven’t won one, distracted by uniform concerns and dominated by skaters from the Netherlands.
